list.title: dayRate
list.description: Calculates the day rate pay given a rate per hour.

list.title: daysInBudget
list.description: Calculates the number of workdays given a fixed budget rounded down.

list.title: priceWithMonthlyDiscount
list.description:
Calculates the discounted cost for large projects, rounding up final price.
Discount is applied to full months only. Remaining days are billed fully.
